verbose_text: As sinc (x < < 1) = ~ 1 - x 2 / 6, IVPD based signal loss increases with the square of the total gradient strength Gd--> 2, encoding efficiency and displacement amplitude, and is inherently coupled to the ratio of resolution and shear wavelength.36 Hence, encoding schemes with higher total gradient strength can suffer from increased IVPD, which, in turn, leads to decreased DNR.
evidence: IVPD, which, in turn, leads to decreased DNR
